short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bookmark all or some open tabs. Choose where the bookmarks are saved. Open previously saved bookmarks in new windows.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
- Choose between all open tabs, tabs open in regular (non-incognito) windows, tabs open in incognito windows, or tabs open in the current window. 

- Specify where the bookmarks should be saved and how they should be organized. Choose between one common folder or a separate folder corresponding to each window.

- Set a default save location to save time.

- Open saved bookmarks in new windows.
